Pre-Game Insights: Andrew Jett is staying with the Phillies, citing Aaron Nola's good run over his last three starts.
The Phillies scored at least three runs in four different innings and led 7-0 after just two frames on Friday.
Nola is 1-0 in his last three starts with four combined earned runs in 18.1 innings of work.
Darren McCaughan has an 8.24 ERA in six games (one start) without a decision this year.
Mccaughan has a 7.75 ERA in 11 career games (two starts).
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game will be played at LoanDepot Park on Saturday, September 7, 2024, at 4:10 pm.
The betting odds are Miami Marlins +185 / Philadelphia Phillies -222, with an over/under of 8.5.
The game will be broadcast on BALLY and NBCSN.
Others: Andrew Jett has been writing about college, professional, and fantasy sports betting since 2013.
